If by "modules" you mean=
 what Eclipse calls "projects"
then I don't think there's any way to do thi=
s.  Projects
has different settings (including classpaths), may come
from d=
ifferent source repositories, etc.  I don't think
it really fits in the Ecl=
ipse project paradigm to run
tests from different projects all within the s=
ame test
suite/group/run/whatever.
